titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individuals who withdrew certain amounts from individual retirement accounts to recontribute such amounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual to recontribute a distribution from an individual retirement plan if: (1) such distribution is received during the six-year period beginning on the date three years before the date of the enactment of this Act; and (2) the ten-percent penalty tax on early distributions was imposed.
